title: Black Dagger Brotherhood Collection
description: This collection contains the first nine books in the Black Dagger Brotherhood.Titles in This Set:Book #1: Dark LoverBook #2: Lover EternalBook #3: Lover AwakenedBook #4: Lover RevealedBook #5: Lover UnboundBook #6: Lover EnshrinedBook #7: Lover AvengedBook #8: Lover MineBook #9: Lover Unleashed
author: J.R. Ward
